00046 #ifdef _INTERNAL_FUNCTION
00047 int nfs_client_id_compute( char      * name,
00048                            clientid4 * pclientid )
00049 {
00050   char         padded_name[CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN] ;
00051   clientid4    computed_value = 0 ;
00052   unsigned int i              = 0  ;
00053   unsigned int offset         = 0 ;
00054   uint64_t     extract        = 0 ;
00055   uint64_t     sum            = 0 ;
00056   uint64_t     i1 ;
00057   uint64_t     i2 ;
00058   uint64_t     i3 ;
00059   uint64_t     i4 ;
00060   uint64_t     i5 ;
00061   uint64_t     i6 ;
00062   uint64_t     i7 ;
00063   uint64_t     i8 ;
00064   uint64_t     i9 ;
00065   uint64_t     l  ;
00066 
00067   if( name == NULL || pclientid == NULL )
00068     return CLIENT_ID_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00069 
00070   memset( padded_name, 0, CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ) ;
00071 
00072   /* Copy the string to the padded one */
00073   for( i = 0 ; i < strnlen( name, CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ) ; padded_name[i] = name[i], i++ ) ;
00074 
00075 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00076   printf( "%s :", padded_name ) ; 
00077 #endif
00078 
00079   /* For each 9 character pack:
00080    *   - keep the 7 first bit (the 8th is often 0: ascii string) 
00081    *   - pack 7x9 bit to 63 bits using xor
00082    *   - xor the last 8th bit to a single 0 , or-ed with the rest
00083    * Proceeding with the next 9 bytes pack will produce a new value that is xored with the 
00084    * one of the previous iteration */
00085 
00086   for( offset = 0 ; offset < CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ; offset += 9 )
00087     {
00088       /* input name is ascii string, remove 8th bit on each byte, not significant */
00089       i1 = padded_name[offset+0] & 0x7F ;
00090       i2 = ( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x7F ) << 7 ; 
00091       i3 = ( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x7F ) << 14 ; 
00092       i4 = ( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x7F ) << 21 ; 
00093       i5 = ( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x7F ) << 28 ; 
00094       i6 = ( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x7F ) << 35 ; 
00095       i7 = ( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x7F ) << 42 ; 
00096       i8 = ( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x7F ) << 49 ; 
00097       i9 = ( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x7F ) << 56 ; 
00098 
00099   sum = (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+0] +
00100         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+1] +
00101         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+2] +
00102         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+3] +
00103         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+4] +
00104         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+5] +
00105         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+6] +
00106         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+7] +
00107         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+8] +
00108         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+9] ;
00109 
00110 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00111       printf( "|%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx | = ",
00112              i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6, i7, i8, i9 ) ;
00113 #endif
00114 
00115       /* Get xor combibation of all the 8h bit */
00116       l = ( padded_name[offset+0] & 0x80 ) ^
00117           ( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x80 ) ^
00118           ( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x80 ) ^
00119           ( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x80 ) ^
00120           ( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x80 ) ^
00121           ( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x80 ) ^
00122           ( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x80 ) ^
00123           ( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x80 ) ^
00124           ( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x80 ) ^
00125           ( padded_name[offset+9] & 0x80 ) ;
00126     
00127       extract = i1 ^ i2 ^ i3 ^ i4 ^ i5 ^ i6 ^ i7 ^ i8 ^ i9 | l ;
00128 
00129 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00130       printf( "%llx ", extract ) ; 
00131 #endif
00132 
00133       computed_value ^= extract ;
00134       computed_value ^= sum ;
00135     }
00136 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_CLIENT_ID_COMPUTE
00137   printf( "\n" ) ; 
00138 #endif
00139 
00140   *pclientid = computed_value ;
00141 
00142   return CLIENT_ID_SUCCESS ;
00143 } /* nfs_client_id_compute */
00144 #endif
00145 
00146 nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00147                                                  
00148 main( int argc, char * argv[] ) 
00149 {
00150     char name[CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN] ;
00151     clientid4 clientid ; 
00152     int i ; 
00153 
00154     if( argc == 1 )  
00155         exit( 0 ) ;
00156 
00157     for( i = 1; i < argc ; i++ )
00158       {
00159         strncpy( name, argv[i], CLIENT_ID_MAX_LEN ) ;   
00160   
00161         nfs_client_id_compute( name, &clientid ) ;
00162         printf( "nfs_client_id_compute --------> #%s#  #%llx#\n", name, clientid ) ;
00163 
00164         nfs_client_id_sha1_compute( name, &clientid ) ;
00165         printf( "nfs_client_id_sha1_compute --------> #%s#  #%llx#\n", name, clientid ) ;
00166       }
00167 }
